title: Energy Trends: December 2020, special feature article - Electricity generation and supply in Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and England, 2016 to 2019
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description: Special feature article from the December 2020 edition of Energy Trends statistical publication.
datasetNotes: On landing page under heading "Documents" where link for dataset can be found.

notes: Included for EDV Pase II Data Vis project as will complement Visualsation. May have some similar data to Energy Trends 6.1 & 6.2.
